stripped_text: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2 credits less. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2[credit] less. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Surat City Grid
